Text.Page:
In an effort to secure supply routes and move military units without argon interference, we employed castanic engineers to tunnel into Granarkus.

I'll teleport you to {@LinkCreature:249#1015} when you're ready. Give him these orders and help him however you can. Let's get back to the fight.

We just blasted the last of the rock a few hours ago.

The argons made regular supply and relief missions difficult to execute, particularly getting into and out of Kanstria."What's that? A town?"

Kanstria? Yeah. Lots of castanics settled there. I heard an elin call it "Little Castanica."

Unfortunately, the argons disrupted the flight platform, so they've been stranded there. I want you to take this flight stone to their flight manager. That'll get them going again.

Oh, a new flight stone! Wonderful!

Now we can resume our flights to Kaiator or Zulfikar fortress. Please accept my thanks.
